Sarah Palin , the former Sarah Palin governor, Representative Mike Pence of Indiana, and Representative Michele Bachmann of Minnesota, already boast significant insurgent support. I don't necessarily think[ Mitt Romney ] is going to be one of those guys who goes to the Tea Party for votes the way other candidates might, said Ryan Rhodes , who is chairman of the Iowa Tea Party Patriots and has been contacted by almost every presidential hopeful except Mitt Romney .`` It doesn't really fit his style of politics.'' writes. Mike Pence was`` perhaps the best chance of uniting the, for lack of better terms, Tea Party and Establishment wings of the Republican Party. Mike Pence is a thoroughly consistent conservative,'' Jim Geraghty explains, but he doesn't snarl, he's rarely negative, and I can't recall too many off-the-wall statements from him. A couple folks tried to persuade me he was boring, but I saw him address the NRA Convention last year, and he blew the doors off the place. David Letterman then asks her what she does in her free time and Betty White says, Oh, I like to do most anything. Play with animals, mostly. And vodka's kind of a hobby. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take.
